Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2022:

Held King’s (PA.) hitless in 1.1 innings of work on 3/6/2022, striking out two.

Earned save with 3.1 IP relief appearance in 3/8/2022 game against John Carroll, striking out four while giving up four hits and a lone earned run.

Held University of Rochester hitless in an inning of work on 4/30/2022, striking out one.

2019: Appeared in 14 games on the mound as a freshman and finished the season with a 4.35 era

Before RIT: Played three years of varsity baseball at West Genesee High School … named the 2018 Central New York Co-Player of the Year … All-New York Second Team selection … earned All-Onondoga High School League first team honors … senior captain … also played varsity football and basketball … was team captain of all three during his sports senior year.

Personal

• Cyber Security major

• Born in Syracuse, NY

• Son of Kevin and Kathy Barry

• Attended West Genesee High School

• His cousin, David Burke, played on the RIT lacrosse team before his graduation in 2012.
